snippet: A federal program intended to promote biodiesel through renewable energy credits has attracted counterfeiters and is hurting the market for smaller biodiesel producers.
abstract: Environmental Protection Agency is scrambling to retool flawed project that was intended to promote biodiesel through renewable energy credits; project attracted counterfeiters and is hurting market for smaller biodiesel producers.
lead_paragraph: A federal program intended to promote biodiesel through renewable energy credits has attracted counterfeiters and is hurting the market for smaller biodiesel producers.

headline.main: U.S. Struggles to Rescue Green Program Hit by Fraud
headline.print_headline: A Program for Green Fuels Has Drawn Counterfeiters
